column4: Hey everyone. so I am currently running Fedora 10 besides Windows 7 and want to fully replace Fedora 10 w/ Ubuntu 8.10. When I load the installer disk I choose the manual install because I don't want to install on the whole drive. When it goes to partition manager I am given a few options. I am given a block that is a few MB which is my recovery partiotion for my laptop. I am given a NTFS formatted partition which I belie
You got cut off at "which I belie"
/ is your main partition (that's the root of your filesystem)
